programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from nextdoor. He moves from house to garden but cant escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: As Robin agonizes over which Bey he should use in the championship match, Multi tells him the history of Scythe Incendio.

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes Justice League Cosmic Clash

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to watch his favourite TV show with Billy, but Mrs Wicket has other plans.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army anyone hit with it becomes nonviolent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Slippy needs iron to fix his spaceracer. Ella tows him to a metal asteroid where Glitch is instructed to cut off a small piece. But when Ella distracts him, he accidentally cuts the asteroid into two large pieces! Ella feels responsible

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: The Dream Factory crew build a Basketball Helper Machine to help them perfect their shooting skills for the Steamport sports camp.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hellbent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: Temptation Under The Sun
programme.desc: While vacationing on an exotic island Detective Cassady Cruz begins a torrid affair with charming expat Travis King, but when his exgirlfriend, Minnie, winds up dead he is accused of her murder.

programme.title: Burned By Love
programme.desc: A divorcee meets a seemingly perfect match on an online dating site, only to learn that hes a scammer. When she attempts to bring him to justice, he transforms into a violent stalker.

programme.title: The Face I Cant Forget
programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2
programme.desc: Learn about the worlds largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bushfire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the longterm recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2
programme.desc: Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: LANDSCAPE ARTIST OF THE YEAR UK
LANDSCAPE ARTIST OF THE YEAR UK
Ultimate 90s Playlist!
programme.desc: Nothing but the best tracks and ultimate anthems from the 90s.

programme.title: 90s Girls On The Dancefloor! Top..
programme.desc: ...50.From club classics to eurodance hits we celebrate all the girls that got us dancing in the 1990s!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest HipHop, R&B, KPop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2010
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2010 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: David Guetta & Friends
programme.desc: Weve got some of David Guettas hottest videos right now, and weve brought some of his famous friends along for the ride too!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: We hop on a dredging ship that removes sediment from the seabed to allow large ships to navigate in the Port of Nagoya. The crews biggest joy is the delicious meals prepared by the onboard cooks!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Traditional carpentry employs wooden joinery in furnishings to fit pieces of wood together without use of metal nails. Artisans breathe new life into the wood, imbuing a Kyoto aesthetic as they work.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Todays CloseUp
programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cuttingedge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is Daddy Pigs birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, its a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving, but struggles to do it all in time. The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starlas barn.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a baby TRex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryders early inventions an aircraft and must be rescued from an outofcontrol flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Dannys at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle for the ages over her. Chloes new alone time is interrupted by living roomcrashing pelican.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force leaves for an outoftown mission, Ray calls on the Danger Force Clones for help. He quickly realizes that even though the clones look just like their superhero counterparts, they are very, very different.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Henrys crush goes on a Valentines date with someone else, Schwoz provides an android to make her jealous. Ray has an unpleasant date with one of Henrys teachers.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he wont leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggys shop, they must resist jamming with the shops musical treasures. The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: After hearing about a contest to find El Falcons next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing and fighting in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid are determined to find out if the new building tenant is their favorite wrestler La Tormenta!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its Smurfs Fool Day and Jokey is beside himself with excitement. When Handy turns the Diaper Daddy Robot into his assistant, the machines memory accidentally gets wiped.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward gets left with a mess when SpongeBob and Patrick use carrier clams to send messages to each other. After cooking his kazillionth Krabby Patty, SpongeBob believes hes developed an allergy to them.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
